availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Jolly (Breckinridge County deputy clerk)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, deputy clerk. Kentucky native. Son of John Jolly and Rachael Jolly. Breckinridge County and Circuit Deputy Clerk from c1860 to 1863.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 1, p. 146. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, Hardinsburg, p. 503. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, Hardinsburg, p. 15. KYR-0001-020-1544. KYR-0001-029-0564.
